assay.description: Assay being run (expressed as a CV name)

exp_datetime.description: Date and time the assay was run.

experimenter.description: Name of the person who is running the experiment.

protocol.description: Name of an excel (.xlsx) file that has values for experiment parameters (see bottom of page for protocol fields) whenever an experiment protocol variable is changed, user will need to create new rearing protocol file and give it a new name
protocol.range_advanced: EP_Box_v003p0.xlsx, EP_Box_v003p1.xlsx, EP_Box_v003p2.xlsx, EP_Box_v003p3.xlsx, EP_Box_v004p0.xlsx, EP_Box_v004p1.xlsx, EP_Box_v004p2.xlsx, EP_Box_v010p2.xlsx
protocol.range_basic: EP_Box_v003p0.xlsx, EP_Box_v003p1.xlsx, EP_Box_v003p2.xlsx, EP_Box_v003p3.xlsx, EP_Box_v004p0.xlsx, EP_Box_v004p1.xlsx, EP_Box_v004p2.xlsx, EP_Box_v010p2.xlsx

screen_type.description: Type of experiment. Non_production is for testing purposes.

cross_barcode.description: Barcode number for cross. Setting this value populates fields 'line', 'effector', etc. via lookup in the Fly Core Filemaker database.

line.description: Verified as legal line name in SAGE. New line names may be added to SAGE using the web interface.

effector.description: Verified as legal effector name in SAGE.

content.description: Genotype of flies. Typically auto-generated from line and effector.

gender.description: The gender or genders of the flies. m=male, f=female, b=both, x=unknown

cross_date.description: Date cross was made to generate this set of flies.

flip_used.description: Which flip of the parents were used to generate the flies. 0 = original cross vials, 1 = first flip vials, etc

flip_date.description: Date cross was flipped to generate this set of flies.

num_flies.description: Number of flies actually put into apparatus for this experiment; may be different from protocol number of flies intended for the experiment.

num_flies_dead.description: Number of dead flies observed at start of experiment; may be different from num_flies.

rearing_protocol.description: Name of an excel (xlsx) file that has values for rearing parameters (see bottom of page for protocol fields) whenever a rearing protocol variable is changed, user will need to create new rearing protocol file and give it a new name
rearing_protocol.range_advanced: RP_Olympiad_v001p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v002p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v003p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v003p1.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v003p2.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v004p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v005p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v006p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v006p1.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v007p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v008p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v008p1.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v009p0.xlsx, unknown
rearing_protocol.range_basic: RP_Olympiad_v001p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v002p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v003p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v003p1.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v003p2.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v004p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v005p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v006p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v006p1.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v007p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v008p0.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v008p1.xlsx, RP_Olympiad_v009p0.xlsx, unknown

rearing_incubator.description: ID number for incubator flies were raised in.

handling_protocol.description: Name of an excel file that has values for pre-assay handling parameters (see bottom of page for protocol fields) whenever a handling protocol variable is changed, user will need to create new rearing protocol file and give it a new name .

handler_cross.description: Name of the person who handled the flies pre-experiment.

handler_sorting.description: Name of the person who sorted the flies.

handler_starvation.description: Name of the person who sorted the flies.

hours_sorted.description: Time in hours since flies were sorted.

hours_starved.description: Number of hours flies were starved prior to start of experiment.

robot_stock_copy.description: Which FlyCore robot stock copy (A or B) of the line was used.

temperature.description: Temperature snapshot at the time the assay was started.

humidity.description: Humidity snapshot at the time the assay was started.

content.description: An open field area for the experimenter to write observations about fly behavior from the start of the experiment.
An open field area for the experimenter to write observations about experimental equipment/conditions at the start of the experiment.

flag_redo.description: Flag specifying whether or not experiment should be re-done.

flag_review.description: Flag specifying whether or not experiment should be re-done.

flag_aborted.description: Flag specifying whether or not experiment was aborted: 0 = not aborted, 1 = aborted.

flag_legacy.description: Flag specifying whether or not experiment was run before final metadata launch on 20110418

content.description: Legal keyword(s) from SAGE cv_term table

archive_behavior.description: Should these experiments be archived, and how should they be handled?
